snippet: A 750-room hotel featuring the theme of exotic locations will open by early 2017 and cost about $550 million, the company said.
abstract: Walt Disney Company says it plans to increase number of hotel rooms at Hong Kong Disneyland by 75 percent; 750-room hotel featuring the theme of exotic locations will open by early 2017 and cost about $550 million.
lead_paragraph: A 750-room hotel featuring the theme of exotic locations will open by early 2017 and cost about $550 million, the company said.

headline.main: Attendance Up, Disney to Add Hotel Rooms at Hong Kong Park
headline.print_headline: Visitors Up, Disney to Add Hotel to Its Hong Kong Park
